sy1: Reddish skin or irritated rosacea, burning, blood shot eyes, indigestion, heart burn or acid reflux, diarrhea, inflammation, painful menstrual cramps.
tr1: Take 100 grams of honey. Mix into it Shankha Pushpi 12 grams / 0.4 oz, Brahmi 12 grams / 0.4 oz, Licorice 3 grams / 0.1 oz, Cardamom 1 gram / 0.04 oz and Nutmeg 1 gram / 0.04 oz.
